name: Homing Pads
flavorText: These enchanted shoulder pieces maintain a constant connection to the origin point of their wearer.
flavorTextHtml: These enchanted shoulder pieces maintain a constant connection to the origin point of their wearer.

secondary.textHtml: +[32 - 35]% Extra Gold from Monsters
Your Town Portal is no longer interrupted by taking damage. While casting Town Portal you gain a protective bubble that reduces damage taken by 54%. (Emanates) [50 - 65]%
